Title: Relates to providing that managed-care facilities notify their residents and their residents' families that a registered sex offender resides on the premises
Summary: Provides that managed-care facilities notify their residents and their residents' families that a registered sex offender resides on the premises.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the notification of residents of managed-care facilities of the presence of a registered sex offender living at the premises
